collectible.title: Alchemist's Collar
collectible.subtitle: If Lost, Return to Cagliostro
collectible.text: A collar gifted to you by Cagliostro as proof of ownership. While she won't force you to wear it (yet), putting it on by your own discretion might indicate to your mistress that you're in need of some punishment...
collectible.unlock: Witness Cagliostro make fun of three small penises in one match. Make sure she's shown her true colors first.
